reviews.text: I stayed two nights at Crowne Plaza Shenyang Parkview on a recent business trip to Shenyang. I picked the hotel based on its location near Beiling Park and close to the People's Government of Liaoning Province, which was the business purpose of my visit.
reviews.title: Like Location Near Beiling Park, but overpriced

reviews.text: Of all the luxury hotels in Shenyang, Crowne Plaza Parkview would be the best choice for avid runners and joggers. Its location across from Beiling Park gives easy access to the best running (and safest) course in Shenyang.
reviews.title: Great Hotel with great staff

reviews.text: For business at government offices or downtown business district, the hotel location is adequate. It is also convenient to the Shenyang North Station, and about the same as most hotels in terms of convenience from Shenyang Station. It is less convenient to Taoxian Airport as the hotel is located on the opposite side of the city, requiring a drive through the city to the Dansu Tollway. Thankfully, Shenyang's roads are extraordinary wide, which seems to keep traffic jams to a minimum.
reviews.title: Overall a Good Choice in Shenyang

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For business at the software park or new offices being developed on the south side of the Hunhe River, a daily drive through wide but chaotic streets of Shenyang towards the Danfu Tollway can get tiring, so for business in these areas or the south side of Shenyang a hotel on the south side of Shenyang would be preferable.
reviews.title: Great rooms!
